title: Admissions | Full-time MBA | UC Berkeley Haas
raw_text:
Admissions
Each fall, we enroll 300 bright, diverse, collaborative, and creative students. We admit candidates with solid professional experience and leadership potential who come from a wide variety of industries and backgrounds.
Take the next step

What We Look For
Professional Experience
Our students have an average of five years of full-time professional work experience, and a diverse array of it, ensuring lively and informed discussion in the classroom.
Full-time Class Profile
Academic Aptitude
We look at your past academic performance for an indication that you will thrive in and make valuable contributions to our rigorous learning environment.
Application Requirements
Personal Qualities
Because our Defining Leadership Principles are integral to how we learn and how we lead, we look for these in your experience and attributes.
Defining Leadership Principles
Learn More About The Application Process
